title: Tuna pasta bake
ingredients: ['125g butter, divided', '1/2 (500g) packet pasta, any small shape', '1/2 medium onion, finely chopped', '1 stick celery, finely chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '250g button mushrooms, sliced', '4 tablespoons plain flour', '500ml milk', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 (185g) tins tuna, drained and flaked', '150g frozen peas, thawed', '3 tablespoons breadcrumbs', '2 tablespoons butter, melted', '140g grated Cheddar cheese']
